Login.Title: Login
Login.Description: Add your details below to get back into the app

Register.Title: Create Account
Register.Description: Let's get you started sharing your links!
Register.AtLeast8Characters: Password must contain at least 8 characters

LinksBuilder.Title: Customize your links
LinksBuilder.Subtitle: Add/edit/remove links below and then share all your profiles in the world!
LinksBuilder.UseAddButton: Use the 'Add New Button' to get started. Once you have more than one link, you can reorder and edit them. We're here to help you share your profiles with everyone!
